Reviews.Title: Refurbished Phone  "Ripoff"
Reviews.Author: Karen Quick
Reviews.Content: I purchased a "Refurbished" Blackberry Pearl Phone thinking that I was truly getting a "like new" refurbished Blackberry Phone for around $80.00  I have had the phone only a few weeks, and it is already "toast."  The first thing I noticed was that the keys were sticking and skipping or repeating every time I tried to make a call.The next problem was that even after deleting calls, the phone redialed the deleted numbers when I tried to call my Voice Mail.  The battery would not stay charged, and I was constantly having to leave the phone to recharge.  The final "straw" was when the phone went completely black, and unusable.  This was just like taking Eighty plus dollars and throwing it into the wind.  I will never purchase anything "refurbished" again, and I frankly think I deserve a full refund from Amazon.com.
